sentences.sContent: The union said they will ballot members on whether to strike.
sentences.sCn: 工会称他们将组织会员们秘密投票表决是否罢工。

synos.tran: 投票；投票用纸；投票总数

phrases.pCn: 投票选举（或表决）；按抽签决定

trans.tranCn: 投票选举， 无记名投票
trans.tranOther: to ask someone to vote for something

trans.tranCn: 投票表决； 无记名投票；选票
trans.tranOther: a system of voting, usually in secret, or an occasion when you vote in this way
